Text: www.bitvn.com. Phim ban dep voi day du Phu de - Thuyet Minh TV

I've been on this download for 15 days now, got to 60%... so, please, please seed...!
Thanks for your kindness.

Finally, completed the d/l. Thanks to the seeders.
While this is one of the more difficult films to find on torrent, the subs are in ?Vietnamese? and in an queer format (.smi). I downloaded a sub from opensubtitles and resynced it using the time values from the smi file. Also note that the frame rate is 30 fps, not 29.97.
Thanks for the share. The texted language is NOT English, you'll have to d/l the subs.
Where can I download the English subs?
